title.narrative: HONDURAS ROAD REHABILITATION AND IMPROVEMENT II

description.narrative: Original To improve the quality of road network and of road management in support of the government's growth and competitiveness goals through: (i) Improved governance and enhanced road management capacity in SOPTRAVI and the Road Fund; (ii) Improvement in selected road corridors; and (iii) Extension in the scope of the maintenance of the unpaved road network. 7.b Revised To improve the quality of road network and of road management in support of the government's growth and competitiveness goals through: (i) Improved governance and enhanced road management capacity in SOPTRAVI and the Road Fund; (ii) Improvement in selected road corridors; and (iii) Extension in the scope of the maintenance of the unpaved road network; and (iv) improvement of the Recipient capacity to respond promptly and effectively to an eligible emergency.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Sch 2 Sec 1 A 1 (a) | Description :Subsidiary Agreement between SOPTRAVI and the Road Fund | Due Date:04-Nov-2010
Finance Agreement :Sch 2 Sec 1 A 1 (a) | Description :Subsidiary Agreement between SOPTRAVI and the Road Fund | Due Date:12-Jan-2009
Finance Agreement :Sch 2 Sec 1 A 2 (a) and (b) | Description :Maintain the project executing unit, with adequate staffing |Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Sch 2 Sec 1 A 2 (c) | Description :Hiring and evaluation of staff of the project executing unit | Frequency:Yearly
Finance Agreement :Sch 2 Sec 1 B | Description :Adopt and maintain an operational manual | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Sch 2 Sec 1 D | Description :No transformation or degradtion of critical natural habitats as a consequence ofproject implementation | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Sch 2 Sec 1 E 2 | Description :No works under A.7, A.8 or A.9 to be carried out prior to updating of the IPP,ESMF and the Resettlement Plan satisfactory to IDA | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Sch 2 Sec 1 E | Description :Adopt a Strategic Sector Plan and a revised Road Maintenance Plan | Due Date:29-Jun-2012
Finance Agreement :Sch 2 Sec II A. 2 | Description :Hold annual reviews in regard to the implementation of the governance actionplan and priority measures | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Sch 2 Sec II B. 3 | Description :Preparation and submission of annual audited financial statements | Frequency:Yearly
